spell1.name: PSIONIC CROSSBOW
spell1.description: Unleash bolts with psionic crossbows to damage enemies and reduce the cooldowns of all her abilities.

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 15m, decreasing to 60% at 30m

spell2.name: DANCE OF THE BUTTERFLY
spell2.description: Slash nearby enemies with a psionic katana, dealing massive damage.
spell2.changeDescription: QoL: Ultimate now checks for barriers when selecting targets

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Psylocke will slash a random enemy or barrier, giving priority to the one who has been hit the least

spell3.name: PSI-BLADE DASH
spell3.description: Dash forward and slice through enemies along the path with psionic blades.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Casting this ability will automatically recall Wing Shurikens. The Shurikens will first travel to Psylocke's starting position before returning to her.

spell4.name: PSYCHIC STEALTH
spell4.description: Enter stealth and gain a Movement Boost.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: When attacked while in stealth, Psylocke will remain in stealth but will briefly become visible for a short duration

spell5.name: WING SHURIKENS
spell5.description: Launch a volley of psionic shurikens that stick to enemies, dealing damage and granting herself Bonus Health. Press again to recall the shurikens.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Projectile that fires in a straight trajectory.

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 15m, decreasing to 80% at 25m

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Shurikens travel towards crosshair when recalled before returning to Psylocke

spell6.name: PSYCHIC ECHOES (Team-Up)
spell6.description: Emma Frost creates Mental Projections of Magneto and Psylocke, forming a Duplicate Illusion that moves and casts abilities to confuse foes.
